mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( id, board_id, title, content ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{board_id}, #{title}, #{content} )
INSERT INTO board_comment( comment_id, content, board_id, id ) VALUES ( #{comment_id}, #{content}, #{board_id}, #{id} )
INSERT INTO board_file( board_id, file_name ) VALUES ( #{board_id}, #{file_name} )
mapper.select: SELECT file_name FROM board_file WHERE board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO board_count( board_id, id ) VALUES ( #{board_id}, #{id} )
